name: Heli Air Attack: Anti Aircraft Action
name_original: Heli Air Attack: Anti Aircraft Action
description:
Soldier be alert there is an enemy helicopter invasion in our near by army remote camp. Enemy has attacked with there fully loaded military helicopters. Its time to show the best ever ground to air attack.
Your Mission:
Go join your team and stop the enemy attack. You are equipped with RPG (Rocket Propelled Gun), target the helicopters and shoot at will. Do not give the heli enough time to fire at your position.

How to Play:

- Touch & Drag the screen anywhere to move/rotate your gun left, right, up or down
- Tap Fire button at bottom right to fire rocket launcher
- The weapon will reload itself and you have unlimited ammunition but time to respond is critical.

Features:

- FPS (First Person Shooter)
- Complete army remote camp with real looking 3D army environment
- Good quality sound effects
- User friendly GUI and controls
- Enemy AI
- Efficient weapon controls & movement
